attributes.action: all persons age 60 years should not pay council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: council tax are too high.those of us who worked all our life and contributed to the state.upon retirement are faced with high counciltax. same cost of living and alltaxes thatare levied. Some of us do not receive a pension equivalent to our wages.Some of us do not qualify for benefit  because of earning only one penny extra to what the government says we should live on

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
